videoSnippet.title: The Happiest Candidate || Wang Hao vs Giri || FIDE Candidates (2020)
videoSnippet.description:
Follow me on Instagram for extra content https://www.instagram.com/agadmator/

Wang Hao vs Anish Giri
World Championship Candidates (2020), Yekaterinburg RUS, rd 2, Mar-18
English, Symmetrical (A37)

1. c4 c5 2. Nc3 g6 3. g3 Bg7 4. Bg2 Nc6 5. Nf3 e6 6. h4 h6 7. d4 cd4 8. Nb5 d5 9. cd5 ed5 10. O-O Nf6 11. Bf4 O-O 12. Qc1 a6 13. Nbd4 Nd4 14. Nd4 Kh7 15. Rd1 Re8 16. Qc7 Qc7 17. Bc7 Bg4 18. f3 Rac8 19. Ba5 Bd7 20. Kf2 h5 21. Bf1 Ng8 22. Bc3 Bh6 23. Rd3 Ne7 24. Rad1 Bg7 25. e3 Kg8 26. R3d2 Ba4 27. Re1 Bd7 28. Ne2 Rc7 29. Bg7 Kg7 30. Nc3 Be6 31. Red1 b5 32. a3 Rb8 33. Ne2 a5 34. Nd4 Bd7 35. b4 ab4 36. ab4 Ra8 37. Rb2 Ra4 38. Rdb1 Rb7 39. Rc1 Rba7 40. Nb5 Bb5 41. Bb5 Ra3 42. Be2 Rb7 43. b5 Rb6 44. Rd1 Kf6 45. Rdd2 Rb7 46. Bd3 Nc8 47. e4 de4 48. Be4 Rb6 49. Rd7 Rc3 50. Rb7 Rb7 51. Bb7 Nb6 52. Be4 Ke5 53. Rd2 Rb3 54. Bc6 Nc4 55. f4 Kf6 56. Rd8 Rb2 57. Kf3 Nd2 58. Ke3 Nf1 59. Kf3 Nd2 60. Ke2 Ne4 61. Kf3


The 2020 Candidates Tournament is an 8-player double round-robin that will decide Magnus Carlsen's challenger for the World Championship match that's set to take place in Dubai this December. The 14-round event is being played in the Hyatt Regency Hotel in Yekaterinburg, Russia from 17 March to 3 April 2020. The prize fund is €500,000.

The players have 100 minutes for 40 moves, then 50 minutes for the next 20 moves, then 15 minutes to the end of the game, with a 30-second increment from move 1. No draw offers are allowed until after move 40. A playoff (beginning with four 25-minute games) is unlikely as head-to-head, no. of wins and Sonneborn-Berger are used first to break a tie for 1st place. Official website: en.candidates-2020.com
